example.text: As promised, House Republicans have already opened the transparency floodgates, shedding light on a slew of this administration's failures and oversteps in their position of power, working against the American people. Because of this work, the House Oversight Committee has deduced that Federal officials have been using their influence and position of authority to censor Americans on social media platforms.

Here are two key highlights: HR 140: PROTECTING SPEECH FROM GOVERNMENT INTERFERENCE ACT I was proud to vote for HR 140 : Protecting Speech from Government Interference Act which prohibits federal employees' ability to censor lawful speech. Our government was created to protect freedom, not suppress it.

Our government, Mr. Chair, and, indeed, our Constitution were created to protect those freedoms, not suppress them. I strongly urge my colleagues to support this bill and prohibit Federal employees from using their authority to influence and censor the lawful freedom of speech.

That's why I voted for S 619 : The COVID-19 Origin Act which declassifies all information about the origins of COVID-19 so everyone can have access to the truth and we can hold the Chinese Communist Party accountable. MAKE SURE YOU'RE TUNING IN TO FRYDAYS WITH FRY!

Our government, Mr. Chair, and, indeed, our Constitution were created to protect those freedoms, not suppress them. I strongly urge my colleagues to support this bill and prohibit Federal employees from using their authority to influence and censor the lawful freedom of speech.
